title: Properties of waves
brief_description: Describes the refraction of waves and illustrates their compression and expansion. Demonstrates and explains both the effects of waves crossing each other and the Doppler effect.
description: Describes the refraction of waves and illustrates their compression and expansion. Demonstrates and explains both the effects of waves crossing each other and the Doppler effect.
